content: The exact sutta you're referring to is not specified as "a sutta", but it can be found in the Cullavagga, a part of the Vinaya Pitaka. The Vinaya Pitaka contains the rules and regulations for Buddhist monastics, and the Cullavagga contains several chapters outlining various aspects of monastic life and conduct. The specific passage you're looking for can be found in the Cullavagga, Book 10, Chapter 3.
